content: प्रदीपः {@--1@} A lamp, light (<ab>fig.</ab> also); अतैलपूराः सरतप्रदीपाः <ls>Ku. 1. 10</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 24</ls>; <ls n="R.">16. 4</ls>; कुलप्रदीपो नृपतिर्दिलीपः <ls>R. 6. 74</ls> ‘light or ornament of the family’; <ls n="R.">7. 29.</ls> {@--2@} That which enlightens or elucidates, elucidation; especially at the end of titles of works; as in महाभाष्यप्रदीपः, काव्यप्रदीपः &c.
